MetaData.MetaDataItem: WiDom Smart TE Dimmer is an "in-wall device" that controls the luminosity level and/or fan speed. A universal device that controls the light intensity of all types of dimmable lights, including LED lamps and energy-saving lamps. The Smart TE Dimmer includes the ON / OFF control option of non-dimmable loads

ChangeLog.Entry: Some fixes comparing with openHab exported file

Value.label: Start-up Status
Value.Help: Defines the status of the device, in term of light level, following a restart. 0-99: 0-99% dimming level after device restart -1: (Defaukt Value) At deviceâ€™s restart it restores the same dimming level at the moment of power failure.

Value.label: Fade On Time
Value.Help: Defines the time spent to switch the load from complete OFF to complete ON. 1 to 127 : Expresses in seconds the time spent to switch the load from complete OFF to complete ON -1 to -126: Expresses in minutes the time spent to switch the load from complete OFF to complete ON (Default Value: 1)

Value.label: Fade Off Time
Value.Help: Defines the time spent to switch the load from complete ON to complete OFF. 1 to 127 : Expresses in seconds the time spent to switch the load from complete ON to complete OFF. -1 to -126: Expresses in minutes the time spent to switch the load from complete ON to complete OFF. (Default Value: 1)

Value.label: Local Dimming Time
Value.Help: Defines the time spent to switch the controlled load when the external switch is hold down. 0: Applies the timing spent to switch the controlled load to Fade On and Fade Off as defined in parameters 2 and 3. 1-60: Expresses in seconds the time spent to switch the load. (Default value: 5)

Value.label: Minimum Light Level
Value.Help: Defines the light level that will correspond to the 1% of dimming. 1 to 98: Defines which light level will correspond to 1% in the range between 1 and 98% (Default Value: 1)

Value.label: Maximum Light Level
Value.Help: Defines the light level that will correspond to the 99% of dimming. 2 to 99: Defines which light level will correspond to 99% in the range between 2 and 99% (Default Value: 99)

Value.label: Dimmable Load
Value.Help: Define how to reset the overvoltage alarm and breaks off the blue blinking. (Defaukt Value: 1)

Value.label: Type of external switch
Value.Help: Defines the type of external switch connected to the device (Default Value: 1 )
